dcterms:creator: Irving Langmuir
dcterms:description: The dataset contains experimental data on the adsorption of gases, specifically nitrogen and methane, on mica surfaces, which is foundational for understanding adsorption phenomena.
dcterms:title: Adsorption of Nitrogen and Methane on Mica

dcterms:creator: T. J. H. Vlugt
W. Zhu
F. Kapteijn
J. A. Moulijn
B. Smit
R. Krishna
dcterms:description: This dataset includes experimental data on the adsorption of isobutane in the zeolite silicalite-1, which is relevant for understanding adsorption in porous materials.
dcterms:title: Adsorption of Isobutane in Silicalite

dcterms:creator: Stephen Brunauer
P. H. Emmett
Edward Teller
dcterms:description: This dataset provides data on the adsorption of nitrogen on a Fe-Al203 catalyst, which is significant for catalysis and adsorption studies.
dcterms:title: Adsorption of Nitrogen on Fe-Al203 Catalyst

dcterms:creator: Stephen Brunauer
P. H. Emmett
Edward Teller
dcterms:description: The BET dataset is used to support the BET theory, which describes multilayer adsorption of gases on solid surfaces.
dcterms:title: BET Dataset (used to support the BET theory)
